name: OpenClaw Projects Plugin
description: Memory provider with projects, todos, and contacts integration

apiUrl.description: Backend API URL (must be HTTPS in production)

apiKey.description: API authentication key (direct value, least secure)

apiKeyFile.description: Path to file containing API key (e.g., ~/.secrets/api_key)

apiKeyCommand.description: Command to execute to get API key (e.g., op read op://Personal/openclaw/api_key)

twilioAccountSidFile.description: Path to file containing Twilio Account SID

twilioAccountSidCommand.description: Command to get Twilio Account SID

twilioAuthTokenFile.description: Path to file containing Twilio Auth Token

twilioAuthTokenCommand.description: Command to get Twilio Auth Token

twilioPhoneNumberFile.description: Path to file containing Twilio Phone Number

twilioPhoneNumberCommand.description: Command to get Twilio Phone Number

postmarkTokenFile.description: Path to file containing Postmark Token

postmarkFromEmailFile.description: Path to file containing Postmark From Email

postmarkFromEmailCommand.description: Command to get Postmark From Email

secretCommandTimeout.description: Timeout for secret command execution in milliseconds

autoRecall.description: Automatically recall relevant memories on conversation start

autoCapture.description: Automatically capture important information as memories

userScoping.description: @deprecated — replaced by namespace config. Kept for backward compatibility.

maxRecallMemories.description: Maximum memories to inject in auto-recall

baseUrl.description: Base URL for web app (used for generating note/notebook URLs)

promptGuardUrl.description: PromptGuard-2 classifier URL for multilingual injection detection (e.g., http://prompt-guard:8190)

default.description: Namespace for store/create when none specified

recall.description: Namespaces to search when none specified

oneOf.description: Shorthand: string treated as { default: value }

apiUrl.label: Backend URL
apiUrl.help: The URL of your OpenClaw Projects backend API

apiKey.label: API Key
apiKey.help: Direct API key value (least secure, for development)

apiKeyFile.label: API Key File
apiKeyFile.help: Path to a file containing your API key

apiKeyCommand.label: API Key Command
apiKeyCommand.help: Command to retrieve API key (e.g., 1Password CLI)

secretCommandTimeout.label: Secret Command Timeout
secretCommandTimeout.help: Timeout in milliseconds for secret retrieval commands

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Automatically inject relevant memories at conversation start

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically store important information as memories

maxRecallMemories.label: Max Recall Memories
maxRecallMemories.help: Maximum number of memories to inject during auto-recall

timeout.label: Request Timeout
timeout.help: Timeout in milliseconds for API requests

maxRetries.label: Max Retries
maxRetries.help: Maximum number of retries for failed requests

baseUrl.label: Web App URL
baseUrl.help: Base URL for the web app (used for generating links)

nominatimUrl.label: Nominatim URL
nominatimUrl.help: URL for self-hosted Nominatim reverse geocoding service (enables geo-contextual search)

promptGuardUrl.label: PromptGuard URL
promptGuardUrl.help: URL for PromptGuard-2 classifier service (enables multilingual prompt injection detection)

namespace.label: Namespace
namespace.help: Namespace config for data scoping. Can be a string (shorthand for default) or { default, recall[] }.
